abstract: Would a 70-game season actually be more attractive because each game might mean a little more?
snippet: Would a 70-game season actually be more attractive because each game might mean a little more?
lead_paragraph: Monday's N.B.A. news - that the league has canceled the first two weeks of its season after negotiations with the players union once again proved unfruitful - means that each team will lose about a half-dozen games for now.

headline.main: Is a Shorter N.B.A. Season So Bad?
